text:
Tension gripped the SRM University campus at Kattankulathur due to a fire in one of its buildings on Saturday afternoon.

According to sources, the fire broke out on the second floor of the tech park building of the university and spread to the floors above.

A faculty member said that the students, including those in the central library building, which is a little away from the one where the fire broke out, were asked to leave the campus around 1 p.m.

He said that a short circuit was suspected to have caused the fire.

According to Fire and Rescue Services officials at Maraimalai Nagar, they received information about the fire around 12.30 p.m.

Five fire tenders equipped with adequate staff were pressed into service and they put out the flames in a battle lasting an hour.

There were no casualties, officials said.

Damage

However, the fire damaged false ceilings, electrical wiring, tables and chairs in the hall.

The exact amount of loss to the property is yet to be ascertained, said police officials who visited the spot.
title: Minor fire breaks out at SRM University
